H0.text: Which former leader of the Conservative Party was MP for Huntingdon. John Major

H1.text: Which former leader of the Conservative Party was MP for Huntingdon. David Cameron

H2.text: Which former leader of the Conservative Party was MP for Huntingdon. Theresa May

H3.text: Which former leader of the Conservative Party was MP for Huntingdon. Majorism

A4.text: John Major was Member of Parliament (MP) for Huntingdon, formerly Huntingdonshire, from 1979 to 2001.
